definition: king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
emperor/god/Hong Xiuquan's self-proclaimed title/see also 洪秀全[Hong2 Xiu4 quan2]
Faye Wong (1969-), Hong Kong pop star and actress
Wang Liqin (1978-), former PRC table tennis player, Olympic medalist
Wang Nan (1978-), female PRC table tennis player, Olympic medalist
king/magnate/person having expert skill in something
king/magnate/person having expert skill in something

sentences.english: Solitary Beauty Peak locates in Guilin Prince City and is an integral part of the Prince City scenic area.
sentences.chinese: 独秀峰位于桂林王城内，是王城景区不可分割的部分。

sentences.english: So the king and all the children of Israel dedicated the house of the LORD.
sentences.chinese: 这样，王和以色列众民为耶和华的殿行奉献之礼。

sentences.english: Three classes for the Eleven-kings under the sky.
sentences.chinese: 三个班属于天空下的精灵王。

sentences.english: This machine was made by Uncle Wang .
sentences.chinese: 这台机器是王叔叔造的。

sentences.english: The king throned the new castle he had taken from his enemies.
sentences.chinese: 这国王在他从敌人那夺来的新城堡即位为王。

sentences.english: Better to reign in hell than serve in heaven.
sentences.chinese: 宁在天堂为王，不到地狱当差。

sentences.english: On that night could not the king sleep, and he commanded to bring the book of records of the chronicles; and they were read before the king.
sentences.chinese: 那夜王睡不着觉，就吩咐人取历史来，念给他听。

sentences.english: O holy Jesus, Prince of peace and Saviour.
sentences.chinese: 圣哉耶稣，万民救主和平王。

sentences.english: And the king of Babylon smote them, and put them to death in Riblah in the land of Hamath.
sentences.chinese: 巴比伦王就把他们击杀在哈马地的利比拉。

sentences.english: But Wang has insisted Zhang simply tripped, AFP reported.
sentences.chinese: 但法新社报道称，王坚持说张只是自己摔倒了。

sentences.english: And the king of Israel disguised himself， and went into the battle.
In distant Jerusalem, wicked Herod was still king.
sentences.chinese: 在遥远的耶路撒冷，缺德的希律王仍然是国王。

sentences.english: He was like a reed moving in wind.
sentences.chinese: 希律王就像一根随风摇曳的芦苇。

sentences.english: We want to know the progress of treating toxic wound caused by cobra.
sentences.chinese: 我们想知道眼镜王蛇咬伤中毒的治疗进展。

sentences.english: Chen Yibing, the "lord of rings", has always kept a low profile and is modest.
sentences.chinese: “吊环王”陈一冰总是保持低调，并且很谦虚。

definition: (classical) a type of battle-ax/to kill/to slaughter
surname Zhao/one of the seven states during the Warring States Period (476-220 BC)/the Former Zhao 前趙 (304-329) and Later Zhao 後趙 (319-350), states of the Sixteen Kingdoms
surname Wu/area comprising southern Jiangsu, northern Zhejiang and Shanghai/name of states in Southern China at different historical periods
Zheng state during the Warring States period/surname Zheng/abbr. for 鄭州|郑州[Zheng4 zhou1]
non-Han people, esp. from central Asia/reckless/outrageous/what?/why?/to complete a winning hand at mahjong (also written 和[hu2])
surname Pan/Pan, faun in Greek mythology, son of Hermes

surname Wei/name of vassal state of Zhou dynasty from 661 BC in Shanxi, one of the Seven Hero Warring States/Wei state, founded by Cao Cao 曹操[Cao2 Cao1], one of the Three Kingdoms after the Han dynasty/the Wei dynasty 221-265/Wei prefecture and Wei county at different historical periods
surname Di/variant of 狄[Di2], generic name for northern ethnic minorities during the Qin and Han Dynasties (221 BC-220 AD)
